trans-unit.source: Provides methods for persisting Web server controls at design-time.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para persistir controles de servidor Web em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The ControlPersister class provides methods that can persist a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> control or an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface implementation as a string of aspx code.
trans-unit.target: A classe ControlPersister fornece métodos que podem manter um <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>controle ou um <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>implementação de interface como uma cadeia de caracteres de código aspx.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of these methods is driven by metadata attributes, such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação desses métodos é controlada por atributos de metadados, como o <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Web Forms page designer does not support the `Reset``PropertyName` method that is optionally exposed by Microsoft Windows Forms-based controls for property persistence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O Web Forms designer de página não dá suporte a `Reset``PropertyName` opcionalmente exposto por controles com base em formulários do Microsoft Windows para a persistência da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object or an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface by parsing a string of control- or template-persistence data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser> class methods.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>objeto ou um <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>Analisando uma cadeia de caracteres de dados de persistência de modelo ou controle de interface, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser>métodos de classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres de dados que representa o formulário persistente do controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Esse método exige um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>implementação funcione corretamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> of the specified control to retrieve the designer host.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>do controle especificado para recuperar o designer host.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> para manter.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the persisted form of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o formulário persistente do controle.

trans-unit.source: Outputs a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Produz uma cadeia de caracteres de dados que representa o formulário persistente do controle especificado para o <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter> especificado

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Esse método exige um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>implementação funcione corretamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> of the specified control to retrieve the designer host.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>do controle especificado para recuperar o designer host.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to output the persisted control data to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>para saída de dados de controle persistente para.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> para manter.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control, using the specified designer host.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres de dados que representa o formulário persistente do controle especificado, usando o designer de host especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Esse método exige um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>implementação funcione corretamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> para manter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> que é o host de designer para o controle.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the persisted form of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o formulário persistente do controle.

trans-unit.source: Outputs a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, using the specified designer host.
trans-unit.target: Produz uma cadeia de caracteres de dados que representa o formulário persistente do controle especificado especificado <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, usando o designer de host especificado.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Esse método exige um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>implementação funcione corretamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to output the persisted control data to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>para saída de dados de controle persistente para.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> para manter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> que é o host de designer para o controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that can persist the inner properties of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres de dados que podem persistir as propriedades internas do controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Esse método exige um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>implementação funcione corretamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The component to persist the inner properties of.
trans-unit.target: O componente para persistir as propriedades internas.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> que é o host de designer para o controle.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the information to persist about the inner properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém as informações para persistir sobre as propriedades internas do controle.

trans-unit.source: Outputs a string of data that can persist the inner properties of the specified control to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, using the specified designer host.
trans-unit.target: Produz uma cadeia de caracteres de dados que podem persistir as propriedades internas do controle especificado especificado <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, usando o designer de host especificado.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Esse método exige um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>implementação funcione corretamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to use.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>usar.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The component to persist.
trans-unit.target: O componente para manter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> que é o host de designer para o controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified template.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres de dados que representa o formulário persistente do modelo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The PersistTemplate method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface implementation in order to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: O método PersistTemplate requer um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>implementação de interface para funcionar corretamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The template to persist.
trans-unit.target: O modelo para manter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> que é o host de designer para o controle.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the persisted form of the template.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o formulário persistente do modelo.

trans-unit.source: Writes a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified template to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: Grava uma cadeia de caracteres de dados que representa o formulário persistente do modelo especificado especificado <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>objeto.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The PersistTemplate method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface implementation in order to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: O método PersistTemplate requer um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>implementação de interface para funcionar corretamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to write the persisted template data to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>para gravar os dados de modelo persistente para.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The template to persist.
trans-unit.target: O modelo para manter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> que é o host de designer para o controle.
